code: import{useState}from'react';import{Navbar,NavbarBrand,Collapse,NavbarToggler,Nav,NavItem}from'reactstrap';import{NavLink}from'react-router-dom';import NucampLogo from'../app/assets/img/logo.png';import UserLoginForm from'../features/user/UserLoginForm';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[menuOpen,setMenuOpen]=useState(false);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar,{dark:true,color:"primary",sticky:"top",expand:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavbarBrand,{className:"ms-5",href:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:NucampLogo,alt:"nucamp logo",className:"float-start"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"mt-1",children:"NuCamp"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavbarToggler,{onClick:()=>setMenuOpen(!menuOpen)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Collapse,{isOpen:menuOpen,navbar:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"ms-auto",navbar:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{className:"nav-link",to:"/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-home fa-lg"})," Home"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{className:"nav-link",to:"/directory",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-list fa-lg"})," Directory"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{className:"nav-link",to:"/about",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-info fa-lg"})," About"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavItem,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{className:"nav-link",to:"/contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa fa-address-card fa-lg"})," Contact"]})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserLoginForm,{})]})]});};export default Header;
